column5: This is a private room with en-suite has a separate entrance in modern style house built in in 1967. Business travelers have access without coming into the house. Most travelers prefer to access the house rather than be separate, the choice is up to you.  Carl and I are the only occupants, aside from Pegasus, Carl's blue and gold macaw . The location is close to highways 3 directions.
column8: Modern Room west of DFW Airport on 3 acres
